page.title: 17EVENTS
page.content: July 13th the annual{barn dance and {barbecue}of the{St. Julie's,Eccleston {P.T.A.}takes place.It is held on the upper floor of a large barn in{Clay {Lane Farm.} This farm dates back to{1690}and originally this building would have been used for drying out the grain.We can still see the original ventilation holes in the wall. Nowadays it has been whitewashed and a stage has been added at one end for the band. The visitors sit on some bales of straw and upturned barrels and in one corner can be seen some of the very old farm equipment. The guests provide their own drink and the barbecue food which is provided by the committee is cooked outside in the courtyard. This event is{greatly enjoyed}by many of the parents in this district.
